TEXT.TITLE: ROY F. WESTON <WSTNA> DISTRIBUTING STATEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Roy F. Weston Inc expects to distribute a statement shortly, a spokesman said. NASDAQ has halted trading in the stock until the announcement is distributed, saying it last traded at 20-3/4. Reuter
